name: My friend the lawyer
description:
Collection _ "Deconstrucción".

Series _ ☞Follow the dance of "Pandora Panama" - Portraits☜

1280X1280 PNG

Between 2017 and 2019 some twitter bots, @pixelsorter (†)/ by Way Spurr-Chen- @botisionista / by sebadelprado - @FFD8FFDB (†)/ by Derek Arnold -, created and exchanged more than 85 thousand images.
These collectibles, thought as stele / socket are created from his works. With this project and this collection I rescued a moment that keeps making me reflect on art, creation / creator and the new speed that the present has.

Twitter account @Solibot1
